audioText: Quand tu es en voyage en Italie, tu découvres toujours de nouveaux endroits magnifiques et des spécialités locales authentiques. Les petites villes historiques offrent une expérience culturelle unique que tu n'oublies jamais.
question: What does the speaker say about traveling in Italy?
options: When you travel there, you always discover magnificent new places and authentic local specialties in historic towns
When you travel there, you should stick to the main tourist attractions to avoid getting lost
When you travel there, you mainly visit modern cities and contemporary art galleries
When you travel there, you prefer staying in large hotels rather than exploring small towns
explanation: The speaker says 'Quand tu es en voyage en Italie, tu découvres toujours de nouveaux endroits magnifiques et des spécialités locales authentiques' - When you are traveling in Italy, you always discover magnificent new places and authentic local specialties. The historic small towns offer a unique cultural experience that you never forget. Note the use of 'es' (second person singular of être) in the travel context.
